--- xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:

> Nightlight/Hydra:
> 
> Nighlight didnt resist, Hydras come in and sat down. Perceptor 
> followed Hydras and waited his commands

Myrmidon seemed to almost materialize from the shadows, his arms folded
across his chest. Dark optics scanned the room for a moment, taking
note of Nightlight, a small smile flickered across his dark features.
"Rodimus Prime is damaged you say? Not even Rodimus anymore?" Myrmidon
tilted his head, crimson optics stared into the Femme, "I wonder how
long it is we will have to keep her alive before he comes to "rescue"
her? It may be sometime." 

He chuckles evilly, "I wonder what we will do in the meantime?"

Preston
(Myrmidon)
